text:
Barbara Nawrocka-Dońska (17 October 1924 – 15 May 2018) was a Polish prose writer, feminist essayist and journalist. She was born in Warsaw. She served as a soldier of the Home Army and took part in the Warsaw Uprising as a nurse during World War II. Nawrocka-Dońska published 28 books, including 5 book editions of foreign reportages. She also wrote in the women's press, including in "Zwierciadło".
Nawrocka-Dońska died on 15 May 2018 in Warsaw at the age of 93.
